explanation: [0-0] On a tennis court with green grass and white lines, a net stands in the middle. Two people in black shirts and white pants stand on opposite sides of the court in the distance. In front of them, a person in white sportswear is making a hitting motion, leaning forward.

[0-4] The person in white sportswear starts to hit a tennis ball forward. Then, a girl in a white suspender and white skirt, wearing a hat, hits the ball back with a racket. A scoreboard appears in the upper left corner of the screen, showing green, purple, and white colors. The scores are 1:1, 2:1, and 15:0 respectively. Then the woman in white sportswear in the distance runs forward to catch the ball, the ball bounces on the ground, then she swipes downwards, hitting the ball to the opposite side. The girl with the hat runs to the right.

[12-21] The camera shifts to the stands. A man in a blue shirt, wearing a blue hat and glasses, is sitting in the crowd. A girl in a gray coat and green top, wearing a white hat, is sitting on his left. The girl looks down at the bag in her hand, the man in the blue hat looks to his left at the girl, and puts the balloon in his hand into the girl's bag. Then they both smile and look down to the left. Finally, the picture switches back to the initial tennis scene.
